caption: "Compose a heartfelt folk melody played on acoustic guitar, expressing the theme of love, by a talented male guitarist."
"Create a lively reggae groove centred around female-driven drums"

"Compose an uplifting and inspirational electronic music piece with a prominent piano melody, incorporating soothing tones and rhythms. The music should be attributed to a talented female pianist, conveying a sense of empowerment and artistic excellence."
